description: The T-51b power armor is an improvement from the T-45 power armor with designs based on the third-generation light power armor. It requires UPS.

use_action.set_charges_msg: You need a UPS or a bionic armor interface to power this.

description: The T-51b power armor is an improvement from the T-45 power armor with designs based on the third-generation light power armor. It is turned on and continually drawing power. Use it to turn it off.
//: 20% more more draw than light power armor

description: A T-51b power armor helmet based on the third-generation light power armor helmet. In addition to the features of a T-45 power armor helmet, it also has night vision and infrared for detecting Chinese Crimson Dragoon units during the Battle of Anchorage.

use_action.msg: The %s seals shut and beeps once.

description: A T-51b power armor helmet based on the third-generation light power armor helmet. In addition to the features of a T-45 power armor helmet, it also has night vision and infrared for detecting Chinese Crimson Dragoon units during the Battle of Anchorage.
//: 20% more power draw than light power armor helmet

description: A T-51b power armor helmet based on the third-generation light power armor helmet. In addition to the features of a T-45 power armor helmet, it also has night vision and infrared for detecting Chinese Crimson Dragoon units during the Battle of Anchorage. The helmet's flashlight is currently on.
//: Heavy duty flashlight but regular flashlight power draw. Due to game limitations you cannot directly go back to active mode.

use_action.msg: You deactivate your %s's light and activate night vision.

description: A T-51b power armor helmet based on the third-generation light power armor helmet. In addition to the features of a T-45 power armor helmet, it also has night vision and infrared for detecting Chinese Crimson Dragoon units during the Battle of Anchorage. The US Military, in cooperation with West Tek Corporation, built the T-45 Power Armor. This model is based on the second-generation power armor but trades some protection for more utilty in the helmet and less power draw when active. It requires UPS.

use_action.set_charges_msg: You need a UPS or a bionic armor interface to power this.

description: The US Military, in cooperation with West Tek Corporation, built the T-45 Power Armor. This model is based on the second-generation power armor but trades some protection for more utilty in the helmet and less power draw when active. It is turned on and continually drawing power. Use it to turn it off.

A T-45 power helmet based on the second-generation power armor helmet but trades some protection for more utility. In addition to the power armor helmet's features, it also has a built-in flashlight and magnifying optics for scouting.

use_action.msg: The %s seals shut and beeps once.

description: A T-45 power helmet based on the second-generation power armor helmet but trades some protection for more utility. In addition to the power armor helmet's features, it also has a built-in flashlight and magnifying optics for scouting.

description: Developed by the Enclave after the Cataclysm, the X-01 is the most advanced power armor model ever built. It requires UPS.

use_action.set_charges_msg: You need a UPS or a bionic armor interface to power this.

description: Developed by the Enclave after the Cataclysm, the X-01 is the most advanced power armor model ever built. It is turned on and continually drawing power. Use it to turn it off.

An X-01 power armor helmet. In addition to the T-51 power armor helmet's features, it also incldes radiation monitor and a military GPS unit to enable navigation for its soldiers while out in the wasteland. Its design makes it look quite menacing.

use_action.msg: The %s seals shut and beeps once.

description: An X-01 power armor helmet. Made for long operations in the wasteland, in addition to the T-51b power armor helmet's features, it also incldes a radiation monitor and a military GPS unit. Its design makes it look quite menacing.

name.str: Brotherhood of Steel T-45 power armor

description: The US Military, in cooperation with West Tek Corporation, built the T-45 Power Armor. This model is based on the second-generation power armor but trades some protection for more utilty in the helmet and less power draw when active. This variant is used by the Brotherhood of Steel, as indicated by their emblem on the chest. It requires UPS.

use_action.set_charges_msg: You need a UPS or a bionic armor interface to power this.

description: The US Military, in cooperation with West Tek Corporation, built the T-45 Power Armor. This model is based on the second-generation power armor but trades some protection for more utilty in the helmet and less power draw when active. This variant is used by the Brotherhood of Steel, as indicated by their emblem on the chest. It is turned on and continually drawing power. Use it to turn it off.

name.str: Brotherhood of Steel T-45 power helmet

description: A T-45 power helmet based on the second-generation power armor helmet but trades some protection for more utility. In addition to the power armor helmet's features, it also has a built-in flashlight and magnifier optics for scouting. This variant is used by the Brotherhood of Steel, but as their emblem is on the chest, the helmet is visually identical to the US military version.

use_action.msg: The %s seals shut and beeps once.

description: A T-51b power armor helmet based on the third-generation light power armor helmet. In addition to the features of a T-45 power armor helmet, it also has night vision and infrared for detecting Chinese Crimson Dragoon units during the Battle of Anchorage. This variant is used by the Brotherhood of Steel, but as their emblem is on the chest, the helmet is visually identical to the US military version. The helmet's infrared is currently on.

The T-51b power armor is an improvement from the T-45 power armor with designs based on the third-generation light power armor. This is a rare variant of T-51 Power Armor, designed as part of a promotional campaign between Nuka Cola and the US Army. Due to its use in civilian expos, most of the helmet functions have been removed. It requires UPS.

use_action.set_charges_msg: You need a UPS or a bionic armor interface to power this.

description: The T-51b power armor is an improvement from the T-45 power armor with designs based on the third-generation light power armor. This is a rare variant of T-51 Power Armor, designed as part of a promotional campaign between Nuka Cola and the US Army. Due to its use in civilian expos, most of the helmet functions have been removed. It is turned on and continually drawing power.  Use it to turn it off.

A T-51B power armor helmet based on the third-generation light power armor helmet. This is a rare variant of T-51 Power Armor, designed as part of a promotional campaign between Nuka Cola and the US Army. Due to its use in civilian expos, it has a weaker flashlight and does not have night vision, infrared, nor magnifying optics.

use_action.msg: The %s seals shut and beeps once.

description: A T-51B power armor helmet based on the third-generation light power armor helmet. This is a rare variant of T-51 Power Armor, designed as part of a promotional campaign between Nuka Cola and the US Army. Due to its use in civilian expos, it has a weaker flashlight and does not have night vision, infrared, nor magnifying optics.

A T-51B power armor helmet based on the third-generation light power armor helmet. This is a rare variant of T-51 Power Armor, designed as part of a promotional campaign between Nuka Cola and the US Army. Due to its use in civilian expos, it has a weaker flashlight and does not have night vision, infrared, nor magnifying optics. The helmet's flashlight is currently on.
